Is it possible to omit both the "heightstart" and "heightend" arguments when calling the command?

Yes, it is possible to omit both the "heightstart" and "heightend" arguments when calling the command. In this case, the command will return all exports on the specified chain, without any height restrictions.

### Arguments:
```
1. "chainname"           (string, optional) name of the chain to look for. no parameter returns current chain in daemon.
2. "heightstart"          (int, optional)   default=0 only return exports at or above this height
3. "heightend"           (int, optional)   dedfault=maxheight only return exports below or at this height
